text: Egh gumazitam ia inigh uan dɨpenimɨn mangan aghuagh, egh ian akam baraghan koghtɨ, eghtɨ dughiar ia dɨpenir kam o nguibar kam ataghraghamim, ia uan dagaribar itir mɨneziba apɨsigh.(10:14) Suren gumaziba arazir kam damutɨma, nguibar ekiamɨn itir gumazamiziba gan fogh suam, me arazir kuram gami. Mak 6:11 ko Aposel 13:51ɨn gan.
